attacks.name: Bubble Beat
attacks.effect: This attack does 20 more damage times the amount of Water Energy attached to your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Roaring Seas
attacks.effect: Discard an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: Grand Echo GX
attacks.effect: Heal all damage from all of your Pokémon. (You can’t use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
